hindi:
धीरे-धीरे रे मना, धीरे सब कुछ होय।
माली सींचे सौ घड़ा, ऋतु आए फल होय।
english:
Dheere dheere re mana, dheere sab kuchh hoy.
Mali siche sau ghada, ritu aaye phal hoy.
translation: O mind go slowly and slowly. Everything will happen in its own time. Gardener can pour hundred buckets of water, but the tree will bear fruits only when the season arrives.
